text: Régis Lacote (born 25 April 1972) is a French CEO. Since February 2018, he is the current CEO of Orly Airport, succeeding Marc Houalla.Régis Lacote nommé directeur de l’aéroport Paris-Orly ==Biography== A graduate from the ESIEE Amiens (1997) and the ENAC (Mastère spécialisé in airport management 1997), he began his career in 1998 as Safety Manager of the Roland Garros Airport.Régis Lacote nommé directeur de l’aéroport d’Orly He joins Paris Aéroport group in 2002 where he performs several jobs. In February 2018, he became CEO of the Orly Airport.Régis Lacote nommé directeur de l'aéroport Paris-Orly ==References== Category:École nationale de l'aviation civile alumni Category:Aviation in France Category:French businesspeople Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Knights of the National Order of Merit (France)
title: Régis Lacote
